title: MCA in PES
content: Hey guys, I'm a 2021 bca passed out and looking to get into mca. Is PES better for mca and does it provide good placements.

comments.body: Hi man. Even I am in such dilemma. I checked their linkedin profile pf 2021 graduate and most people with good ofgers were from btech be. I want to confirm if the mca guys also get same opporunities.
